attributes.action: Stop the censorship of Wikipedia by the Internet Watch Foundation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to an image which has been classed by the unofficial source of the IWF, part of Wikipedia has been censored. Wikipedia is one of the most used sites on the internet and arguably one of the most important in defending the freedom of information. Nobody should tolerate this blanket censorship made by a bureaucracy of self-appointed internet police. The validity of this group as a charity needs to be called into question.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
